message: Sure! Our dining hall offers several types of pizzas. Here's our selection: Margherita, Al Funghi, Paneer Kathi, Farm House, Banana & Nutella, Chicken Alfredo, Chicken Tikka, Dynamite Chicken, Pepperoni, Beef Supreme, Seafood Marinara, and Smoked Salmon & Avocado. Could you please specify which one you'd like to order? Or if there's something else on our menu that you prefer?
